definitions.definition: To falsely produce what appears to be official or valid; to produce a forged copy of.
examples: to counterfeit the signature of another, coins, notes, etc.

definitions.definition: To produce a faithful copy of.

examples: to counterfeit the voice of another person

definitions.definition: Of a turn or river card, to invalidate a player's hand by making a better hand on the board.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To falsely produce what appears to be official or valid; to produce a forged copy of.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , obsolete ) To produce a faithful copy of.
( transitive , obsolete ) To feign ; to mimic .
( transitive , poker , usually "be counterfeited" ) Of a turn or river card, to invalidate a player's hand by making a better hand on the board.
